Chaos Monkey Alternatives - Kubernetes

  • URL: https://www.gremlin.com/chaos-monkey/alternatives/kubernetes
  • Parent: Category Section: Infrastructure
  • Content:
    • Overview: See above.
    • kube-monkey: Detail the kube-monkey tool, which is an implementation of Chaos Monkey for Kubernetes clusters.
    • Exploring Attack Resiliency via Node Maintenance: Overview of how to use the open source Chaos Toolkit to inject Chaos experiments into Kubernetes clusters.
    • Database Termination Experiment with Kubernetes and PostgreSQL: Tutorial for how to test the loss of the master database and its impact on the overall application.
    • pod-reaper: A rule-based pod killing container for Kubernetes.
    • powerfulseal: Adds Chaos experiments to Kubernetes via targeted pod killing and starting/stopping VMs.
